Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_close_3D_object

The function AIL_close_3D_object closes the specified 3D object.

void AIL_close_3D_object(
  H3DPOBJECT obj
);

In Parameters

obj
indicates 3D object to close.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_open_3D_object
Related Basic Types: H3DPOBJECT, void
